page.title: 07A Comprehensive School Sheff
page.content: Hinde House{Comprehensive}lower school is 29 years old and the upper school is 21 years old. There are two different blocks and 35 classrooms in each block.{1200}children aged 12-18 years go to the school. There are{70 teachers. At lunchtime 350 people eat school dinners. We went into the assembly hall where there were lots of chairs and some people doing their exams. We saw two shields and lots of drawings at the back of the hall. Their paintings were fantastic. The building is very big and they have a very big playing field too. They have a very good football team. It is the best in the league. Some people go on at 18 to college and some do more training in engineering and farming. We think it is good at Hinde House and when we go there we would like to be in their football team.
